languages.text: "Тебя волнует, что они прирезали тысячи людей, но сделали это без уважения? Чокнутая".
"They slaughtered thousands of people, but what bothers you is that they did it without showing the proper respect? Madness."
languages.original_text: "Тебя волнует, что они прирезали тысячи людей, но сделали это без уважения? Чокнутая".

traits.locale_text: "They slaughtered thousands of people, but what bothers you is that they did it without showing the proper respect? Madness."
"They slaughtered thousands of people, but what bothers you is that they did it without showing the proper respect? Madness."
"They slaughtered thousands of people, but what bothers you is that they did it without showing the proper respect? Madness."
"They slaughtered thousands of people, but what bothers you is that they did it without showing the proper respect? Madness."
"They slaughtered thousands of people, but what bothers you is that they did it without showing the proper respect? Madness."

languages.text: "Sie haben Tausende abgeschlachtet, doch Euch stört nur, dass sie dabei nicht den nötigen Respekt gezeigt haben? Irrsinn."
languages.original_text: "They slaughtered thousands of people, but what bothers you is that they did it without showing the proper respect? Madness."

traits.locale_text: "Sie haben Tausende abgeschlachtet, doch Euch stört nur, dass sie dabei nicht den nötigen Respekt gezeigt haben? Irrsinn."

languages.text: « Ils ont massacré des milliers d'innocents, mais ce qui vous dérange, c'est qu'ils l'aient fait sans leur témoigner le respect qui leur était dû ? Vous êtes folle à lier, ma parole. »
languages.original_text: "They slaughtered thousands of people, but what bothers you is that they did it without showing the proper respect? Madness."

traits.locale_text: « Ils ont massacré des milliers d'innocents, mais ce qui vous dérange, c'est qu'ils l'aient fait sans leur témoigner le respect qui leur était dû ? Vous êtes folle à lier, ma parole. »

languages.text: «Masacraron a miles de personas, ¿y lo que le molesta es que lo hicieron sin mostrar el respeto adecuado? Qué locura».
languages.original_text: "They slaughtered thousands of people, but what bothers you is that they did it without showing the proper respect? Madness."

traits.locale_text: «Masacraron a miles de personas, ¿y lo que le molesta es que lo hicieron sin mostrar el respeto adecuado? Qué locura».

languages.text: 「彼らは何千人もの人々を虐殺したというのに、あなたが気になるのは、彼らが敬意を示さなかったことだというの？狂っている」
languages.original_text: "They slaughtered thousands of people, but what bothers you is that they did it without showing the proper respect? Madness."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは何千人もの人々を虐殺したというのに、あなたが気になるのは、彼らが敬意を示さなかったことだというの？狂っている」

languages.text: “他们屠戮了成千上万平民，可你在意的点却是他们没有表现出应有的敬意？你简直是脑子有病。”
languages.original_text: "They slaughtered thousands of people, but what bothers you is that they did it without showing the proper respect? Madness."

traits.locale_text: “他们屠戮了成千上万平民，可你在意的点却是他们没有表现出应有的敬意？你简直是脑子有病。”

languages.original_text: "They slaughtered thousands of people, but what bothers you is that they did it without showing the proper respect? Madness."

languages.text: "Binlerce insanı katlettiler. Ancak senin canını sıkan, bunu doğru düzgün hürmet göstermeden yapmaları mı? Delirmişsin."
languages.original_text: "They slaughtered thousands of people, but what bothers you is that they did it without showing the proper respect? Madness."
